Albert's Magic Schoolhouse

STORY:

Albert asks you to bring foods to the cafeteria. But you have to solve art problems, which makes hard, but what makes it more harder is YOUR MISTAKES...

Just don't do mistakes, they were building old stuff for so long, they're tired. Don't. make. them. angry... Albert just can't controll himself
